attributes.action: Expel Abu Qatada and his dependants to Brussels If we cannot expel them to Jordan! Let them carry the burden!
attributes.additional_details:
If the convicted terrorist Abu Qatada is not "Allowed" to be expelled to Jordan?

Why should the people of the UK be required to maintain and care for such a Person??

Make arrangements at the soonest piossible time to expel him to Brussels and let them keep him in custody AND his dependants as well!

Thus removing a financial Burden from the UK taxpayer and yet another international terrorist from our shores!

Perhaps then Brussels will not be so fast to encroach on our right to our nations safety!
